name: TOFA - Token of Appreciation
tag_list: token-of-appreciation, tokens, gratitude, gratitude-coins, transformation, pay-it-forward
overview:
Jo Englesson, heir to Swedish furniture manufacturer, Englesson.com, announced the launch of TOFAâ„¢, a Token of Appreciation, on Thursday, June 26, 2008. Dedication of the first â€œGiving Yearâ€ began at noon, exactly one year from the ideaâ€™s inception.

TOFAâ„¢ was inspired on June 26, 2007 when Jo Englesson, not paying attention, plowed into Don Warms while traveling through an airport, nearly knocking them both to the ground. After assuring Jo he was not angry or hurt, the octogenarian joked with Englesson that she probably did it all the time. Relieved, Englesson said goodbye and watched Mr. Warms walking away, all the while searching her pockets for something she could give the gentleman as a token of her appreciation for his kindness.

Realizing she had nothing to give him, she began to form an idea to create something that would encapsulate gratitude. â€œWhat if I had a token that had the power to thank someone for what they did or said to make a difference? A token that said it allâ€ says Englesson, a soft-spoken, Swedish blonde who received her education as an economist from Loyola Marymount University in Los Angeles. â€œWhat if I could change the world one connection at a time? That day, TOFAâ„¢ was born.â€TOFAâ„¢â€™s strength lies in the Token Tracking System. Once given, the coins can be passed along to individuals as appreciation and may be tracked online via their unique serial numbers at TOFAâ„¢â€™s website, www.tofa.us.

At the dedication on June 26th, Don Warms received the Number 1 TOFAâ„¢ coin cast in silver and became the first Honorary VIP Member for Life. This also initiated the first â€œGiving Yearâ€, where Englesson has documented her experience of giving one token a day for 365 days â€“ inspiring others to see the value of gratitude and begin their own â€œGiving Year.â€

TOFAâ„¢â€™s goal is to generate a social awareness conversation in the world through daily connections via the tokens and the website. TOFAâ„¢ aims to have 1,000,000 tokens in circulation by December 2012.
